displayName: Ingestion Quota Limit Approaching Alert Policy

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
{ 
fetch chronicle.googleapis.com/Collector 
| metric 'chronicle.googleapis.com/ingestion/log/bytes_count' 
| group_by [], sum(val()) 
| every 1s 
| window 10m 
; 
fetch chronicle.googleapis.com/Collector 
| metric 'chronicle.googleapis.com/ingestion/quota_limit' 
| filter (metric.quota_type == 'SHORT_TERM_DATA_RATE') 
| group_by [], [value_quota_limit_min: min(value.quota_limit)] 
| every 1s 
| window 10m 
} 
| join 
| div 
| condition val() > 0.5
